name: My Love - Swipe & Match 3
description:
Test your reaction and agility in this cute swiping and matching game, featuring three different and addictive love themed modes. Use angelic power-ups to help you along, and play through numerous levels as you try your hardest to master the game.

FEATURES

+ Love theme with lots of cute graphics.
+ Three uniquely different modes; Arcade, Collector and Score Panic
+ Each mode is easy to learn, yet hard to master.
+ Angelic power ups.
+ Separate leader boards for each mode and a combined board to show who's really the champion!
+ Progress is saved in every mode - try out the different modes without losing your saves.
